NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 COLEUS: Thanks to Melorae's new quantum rule, we should at last be able to reach the Quantum Moon's surface without its clouds obscuring our sight and allowing it to slip back into superposition. 2 1 MELORAE: In addition, with the discovery that the tentacled species are drawn to the surface of Giant's Deep by the Quantum Moon's gravity, we have even been able to calculate the moon's physical mass through its gravitational forces! 3 1 THATCH: Plume, are you sure you do not wish to join us on this expedition? This expedition to the Quantum Moon could bring us closer to our goals than ever before. 4 3 PLUME: I am sure. I must stay behind to take care of Phlox, but I wish you all well, my friends. I shall watch your expedition from afar with bated respiration! 5 4 COLEUS: Oh, but Plume, if you wish to watch our expedition, the thick clouds here on Giant's Deep will surely completely obscure your sight of our shuttle! 6 5 COLEUS: I suggest visiting the Quantum Moon locator on Ember Twin's south pole instead. With the locator's assistance, you would have a clear view of which planet the Quantum Moon is orbiting at all times! 7 6 COLEUS: In addition, a set of eyes at the locator would help us greatly in locking the Quantum Moon in orbit around a specific planet, allowing us more eyes to calculate a shuttle trajectory to our destination! 8 7 PLUME: That would be a wise idea, Thatch. Phlox and I will gladly serve as your set of eyes from afar; Be curious on your journey, my friends! LC_G R4 2 LC_G R5 2 LC_G EX1 1 LC_G EX2 2 LC_G EX3 3 SF Jelly EX1 3 SF Jelly EX2 3 SF Jelly EX3 3
